title: Quinns new blind op?
body: SOS today i played quite a few games of league and ive been noticing alot of quinn being played, and it is just cancer.  Her new blind makes your vision worse the nrek sai when burrowed and u literally cant see shit, its like having a nocturne ult on you every 5 seconds.  honestly that needs to be nerfed or changed, make the reduced vision radius larger or just remove it entirely.

replies.body: It's not a blind, it's reduced vision range.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=BvAmEZlZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-06T09:54:05.678+0000)
>
> It's not a blind, it's reduced vision range.

cause (someone) to be unable to see, permanently or temporarily.
"the injury temporarily blinded him"
synonyms:	make blind, **~~deprive of sight, deprive of vision~~**, render unsighted, render sightless, put someone's eyes out, gouge someone's eyes out

https://49.media.tumblr.com/b9878485c34f5713feb9c5aad48291cb/tumblr_ny09iot9jc1sbqrlmo1_500.gif

You can be blind in one eye, or blind to certain things, or blind to a certain area so realistically it's a blind of some form, technically and literally however it's not a "blind" of the League -debuff- sense, but the literal. It's not hard to make the connection from the phrase "Quinn blinded me to things beyond 500 range" when abbreviated to "Quinns blind effect". Simple paraphrase in case you missed the context of her Q being a blind (to a certain area [anything beyond X range]) which can basically be reduced to "her blind".
does that mean you refer to graves smoke screen a blind aswell?
the elfen lied gif is real tho

I don't see what you're talking about it. Maybe I'm blind to it. Guess you can be blind but still see. Maybe partial blindness is still a form of blindness and the phrase "Blind" is figurative like the phrase "I have a ton of homework" basically means a lot (not hundreds upon hundreds of KGs) and "Blind" can mean "I dont see that" so when someone says "She blinded me" It might have been her dazzling good looks not her gouging out your eyes, or maybe Quinn just Q'd and they couldn't see much and exaggerated the phrase or was "speaking figuratively" not literally (I couldn't see much, so was vision impaired/blinded) [speaking figuratively] - blind. (with parameters).

www.learnfigurative.com {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

> [{quoted}](name=Nya Hop,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=BvAmEZlZ,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-06T10:46:29.531+0000)
>
-

I don't understand you Heartvine, why do you just attack people?

You can see that OP is saying "new" as in "Change to" or speaking figuratively. It honestly just seems like you just want to attack people and you're not even relating to what was said, you're just attacking their speaking figuratively or their using "new" as "Changed" in the phrase "new blind". (changed blind)/(updated blind)/(updated to/of blind).

Nope. Every game i've played that has a quinn in it, the quinn is trash. She does no damage and can never catch up if far behind. If this is an "OP" champ, I don't see how.

It's not an issue of them being bad either, because I check their stats and all their other adc's are average/decent, but quinn is terrible.
Yeah, she lacks the raw damage compared to other ADC's. She has a bit of utility on her, but I take her top rather than bot.

Hey I just randomed Quinn in ARAM.

Yeah she's broken as f. The ulti mobility's a joke too.
